text: Excellent doctor, detailed explanations, and results better than I could have imagined.

Anna provided exhaustive answers to all my questions in a thorough manner that additionally shows that aesthetic medicine is her passion. The procedure was painless and performed with exceptional precision, and moreover, it took place in a pleasant and friendly atmosphere. I definitely recommend!
The doctor explains everything thoroughly, is very empathetic, and I am satisfied with the result. In fact, the result exceeded my expectations :) I definitely recommend.
Great client contact, excellent results. This is not the first visit and certainly not the last.
The doctor is very factual, empathetic, a very pleasant person, gives great advice, and understands the patient's needs.
I am very satisfied with the visit. Anna answered all questions exhaustively, even those not directly related to the procedure. I recommend
Professionalism and commitment, full clarity regarding all stages of the procedure, the doctor listens to the patient's expectations and is empathetic. I recommend.

I highly, highly recommend the doctor. From the very first visit, I knew I was in good hands. She provided me with full information, proposing treatments tailored to me that gave a natural effect, which was most important to me. Every visit was professional and in a pleasant atmosphere. I fly to the doctor from Norway, but it's always worth it.

A holistic look at me and my skin! This was not an ordinary procedure! I experienced a comprehensive analysis and received beautiful feedback: how to care for my skin, what treatments to use, and what won't serve me, etc. Dr. Anna is a person with passion - use her services, I wholeheartedly recommend and will definitely be back!
The doctor is very friendly, empathetic. Wonderful approach to the patient, thoroughly explained my health condition. I wholeheartedly recommend.
The doctor is great, explained, and examined very thoroughly. A doctor by vocation.
The doctor is friendly, but unfortunately, in my opinion, the diagnosis was wrong. I was diagnosed with impetigo around the mouth and was supposed to be prescribed an oral antibiotic....
Great empathy and approach to the patient. Quick appointment availability.
A very friendly and substantive doctor.
Very good impressions after the visit. Great commitment from the doctor.
I wholeheartedly recommend
Thank you for the professional explanation of my problem. Very factual and competent.
A very pleasant doctor, explained everything to me, and there will be further diagnostics and treatment

The doctor has a very good approach to patients. She takes reported symptoms seriously, explains everything in great detail, does not pressure with recommendations but only proposes them. The medications she prescribed helped immediately.

I pay a lot of attention to the empathy of doctors, especially at such prices. And here the doctor did very well because a person without knowledge gets stressed and panics, and it is up to the doctor to convey the diagnosis/treatment so that the patient feels better and more confident upon leaving. Fortunately, nothing serious, the prescribed medication is already working, and I am calm and satisfied!
